properties.entry: SELECT ROWNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_NO , CATEGORY_NAME , PRODUCT_NAME , PRICE , DISCOUNT_PRICE , PATH FROM TB_PRODUCT JOIN TB_CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.value ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5

SELECT ROWNUM, B.* FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_NO ,CATEGORY_NAME ,PRODUCT_NAME ,PRICE ,DISCOUNT_PRICE ,PATH ,TO_CHAR(NVL((SELECT AVG(RATING) FROM TB_REVIEW WHERE PRODUCT_NO = TB_PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NO),0),'0.0')AVG_REVIEW FROM TB_PRODUCT JOIN TB_CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY AVG_REVIEW DESC )B WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5

SELECT ROWNUM, N.* FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_NO ,CATEGORY_NAME ,PRODUCT_NAME ,PRICE ,DISCOUNT_PRICE ,PATH ,ENROLL_DATE FROM TB_PRODUCT JOIN TB_CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC )N WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5

SELECT RR.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, R.* FROM ( SELECT RECIPE_NO ,RECIPE_TITLE ,RECIPE_INTRO ,THUMBNAIL_URL ,CATEGORY_NAME ,USER_ID ,USER_PATH ,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_LIKE WHERE LIKE_TYPE = 'R' AND LIKE_REFNO = TB_RECIPE.RECIPE_NO ) TOTAL_LIKED ,PRODUCT_NO ,PRODUCT_NAME ,PRICE ,DISCOUNT_PRICE ,PATH PRODUCT_PATH FROM TB_RECIPE JOIN TB_CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER USING (USER_NO) JOIN TB_PRODUCT USING (PRODUCT_NO) WHERE RECIPE_STATUS = 'Y' AND TB_PRODUCT.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY TOTAL_LIKED DESC )R WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 6 )RR WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ?
